name: bcrypt - blowfish file encryption
short_description: bcrypt is a lightweight blowfish file encryption utility which aims for cross-platform portability of not only the actual code, but the encrypted files as well. In addition to providing 448-bit encryption, bcrypt overwrites input files with random garbage

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License
